com.jrefinery.chart
Class HorizontalBarPlot

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.jrefinery.chart.Plot
        |
        +--com.jrefinery.chart.BarPlot
              |
              +--com.jrefinery.chart.HorizontalBarPlot
All Implemented Interfaces:
AxisChangeListener, CategoryPlot, ChartChangeListener, HorizontalValuePlot
public class HorizontalBarPlot
extends BarPlot
implements HorizontalValuePlot

A Plot that displays data in the form of a bar chart, using data from any class that implements the CategoryDataSource interface.

See Also:
Plot, CategoryDataSource

          The renderer for the bars.

Constructor Detail

HorizontalBarPlot

public HorizontalBarPlot(Axis horizontalAxis,
                         Axis verticalAxis,
                         java.awt.Insets insets,
                         double introGapPercent,
                         double trailGapPercent,
                         double categoryGapPercent,
                         double seriesGapPercent)
                  throws AxisNotCompatibleException,
                         PlotNotCompatibleException
Standard constructor: returns a BarPlot with attributes specified by the caller.
Parameters:
horizontalAxis - The horizontal axis.
verticalAxis - The vertical axis.
introGapPercent - The gap before the first bar in the plot.
trailGapPercent - The gap after the last bar in the plot.
categoryGapPercent - The gap between the last bar in one category and the first bar in the next category.
seriesGapPercent - The gap between bars within the same category.
